```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# let's create some numbers 
myNumbers <- c(3, 2, 4, 6, 1, 6, 9, 11, 3, 4)
```

```{r}
# just simply use 'summary()' function in R
summary(myNumbers)
```

## then you get 5 number summary
